## Checkpoints (A Cada 2h)

### Thresholds de Metricas

| Metrica | Target | Aceitavel | Critico |
|---------|--------|-----------|---------|
| CPU | <80% | <90% | >90% |
| Memory | <85% | <90% | >90% |
| Error Rate | 0 critical | <5 warnings | >0 errors |
| Response Time (P95) | <2s | <3s | >3s |
| DB Connections | <15 | <18 | >18 |

## Comandos Uteis

### Railway Logs
```bash
railway logs --service etp-express-backend
railway logs --service etp-express-backend | grep -i error
railway logs --service etp-express-backend | grep -i "CPU\|Memory"
```

### Health Check com Response Time
```bash
curl -w "@curl-format.txt" -o /dev/null -s https://etp-express-backend.railway.app/api/health
```

### Database Connections
```bash
railway run psql -c "SELECT count(*) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE state = 'active';"
```

### Sentry Events (Ultimos 24h)
```bash
# Verificar no dashboard: https://sentry.io/organizations/confenge/issues/
```

## Escalation

**Se incidente P0:**
1. Notificar lider tecnico imediatamente
2. Documentar em `.github/incidents/`
3. Comunicar early adopters se houver downtime
4. Iniciar postmortem apos resolucao

**Contatos Emergencia:**
- Lider Tecnico: ________________
- DevOps: ________________
- Suporte Railway: support@railway.app
